block.p: Shana Alyse Elberg, a daughter of Judi and Darryl Elberg of New City, N.Y., was married on Thursday evening to Erik Bradley Weinick, the son of Susan and Howard Weinick of Woodmere, N.Y. Rabbi Henry Sosland performed the ceremony at Tappan Hill in Tarrytown, N.Y.
The bride and bridegroom, both 23, graduated from Cornell University, where they are now third-year law students.

Shana Alyse Elberg, a daughter of Judi and Darryl Elberg of New City, N.Y., was married on Thursday evening to Erik Bradley Weinick, the son of Susan and Howard Weinick of Woodmere, N.Y. Rabbi Henry Sosland performed the ceremony at Tappan Hill in Tarrytown, N.Y.
The bride and bridegroom, both 23, graduated from Cornell University, where they are now third-year law students.
The bride's father owns Campus Communications, a company in New City that publishes magazines for prospective college students.
The bridegroom's mother is the assistant principal of Public School 255 in Flushing, Queens. His father teaches industrial arts at Middle School 141 in Riverdale, the Bronx.
